title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: There is a bug in Photon where the popup menu in the Java editor ruler is not appearing.
OB: When I right click on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, the expected popup menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc. does not appear.
EB: I expect that when I right click on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, a popup menu should appear, allowing me to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. The popup menu for adding breakpoints/marks, etc. should appear, but it does not.
